00032 #ifndef KYRA_CANVAS_INCLUDED
00033 #define KYRA_CANVAS_INCLUDED
00034 
00035 #include "image.h"
00036 #include "canvasresource.h"
00037 
00038 
00039 struct KrPaintInfo;
00040 class  KrCanvasResource;
00041 union  KrRGBA;
00042 
00043 
00054 class KrCanvas : public KrImage
00055 {
00056   public:
00057 
00059         KrCanvas( KrCanvasResource* resource );
00060         virtual ~KrCanvas();
00061 
00062         virtual void Draw(      KrPaintInfo* paintInfo, 
00063                                                 const grinliz::Rectangle2I& clip,
00064                                                 int window );
00065 
00066         int Width()                     { return resource->Width(); }   
00067         int Height()            { return resource->Height(); }  
00068 
00074         KrRGBA* Pixels()        { return resource->Pixels(); }
00075 
00081         void Refresh()          { resource->Refresh(); }
00082 
00083         virtual KrImNode* Clone();
00084 
00085         virtual void QueryBoundingBox( grinliz::Rectangle2I* boundingBox, int window = 0 );
00086         virtual bool HitTest( int x, int y, int flags, std::vector<KrImage*>* results, int window );
00087         virtual KrCanvas* ToCanvas()    { return this; }
00088         virtual void CalcTransform( int window );
00089         virtual KrResource* Resource()                  { return resource; }
00090         
00091   protected:
00092 
00093   private:
00094         KrCanvasResource* resource;
00095 };
